titles.title: To provide for the sealing or expungement of records relating to Federal nonviolent criminal offenses, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary, and in addition to the Committees on Agriculture, and Ways and Means, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
